search_btn.search_placeholder: Enter the appropriate words for what you are looking for...

login.title: Login
login.description: Enter your details to login. If you don't have an account in Haws, we will automatically create one for you and your information.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters

newUserModal.notRegisteredTitle: This email is not registered in the Haws family. You don't have an account!
newUserModal.description: We can create an account for you automatically... if you have an account, you can go back and fix the email

authGuard.title: Login Required
authGuard.description: Please log in to view this category.

promotions.smallCharactersDesc: We provide everything you need from anime characters, artistic statues in studied molds
promotions.playstationDesc: Best performance and best control in one place.
promotions.playstationSub: Not just control, but high performance

contact.subtitle: Speed in Response
contact.description: High speed in response faster than a rocket. You can rely on our fast and technical support to solve problems you face. The Haws technical team enjoys high experience in communication and technology, so we choose our employees with great care and accuracy to meet your needs.

hero.title: Gaming Keyboard RGB Professional Colors
hero.subtitle: High performance and ergonomic design for gaming
hero.description: Enjoy an unparalleled gaming experience with our new mechanical keyboard, featuring high response speed and stunning RGB lighting.
hero.paymentDesc: Cash on delivery or via credit card

fastDelivery.title: Fast Delivery
fastDelivery.description: High speed and security in delivering orders, all you have to do is buy and we will follow your order carefully.

orderTracking.title: High Tracking for Your Orders
orderTracking.description: We provide you with an easy graphical interface to follow up on orders, you can follow the progress of your order with ease.

securePayment.title: Secure and Convenient Payment
securePayment.description: We provide security for your bank data as we do not store any sensitive data, and we encrypt and protect it from intruders.

categorySection.title: Choose what suits you carefully
categorySection.subtitle: The best products with the best categories

headphones.title: BLACK FRIDAY
headphones.subtitle: EXCEPTIONAL GIFTS
headphones.description: High performance from the finest you can experience

mouse.subtitle: More than performance
mouse.description: High performance from the finest you can experience

keyboard.title: Gaming Keyboard RGB
keyboard.subtitle: Professional Colors
keyboard.description: High performance from the finest you can experience

productPage.title: Professional RGB Gaming Keyboard
productPage.subtitle: High performance from the finest you can experience
productPage.description: Multi-color RGB lighting with various control modes. Three charging speed settings to meet your needs. Two brightness control modes for eye comfort. Durable mechanical design to withstand heavy use.

shipping.title: Shipping Details
shipping.desc: Delivery within 3-5 days  Free delivery for orders above 100$.

checkout.title: We need your contact information!
checkout.terms_note: By completing this form, you agree to be contacted by the Hawas team, and you will receive the latest news about your products and details via email. We assure you that we will handle your information with care. Please review <terms>Terms and Conditions</terms> and <privacy>Privacy Policy</privacy> of our website.

in_delivery_info.title: Order In Delivery
in_delivery_info.description: Thank you for your patience. Your order has been shipped and handed over to the shipping company. Delivery is now in progress and may take 4 to 6 days, but we are working hard to make it much shorter. Check our delivery policy to learn more about our shipping methods.

processing_info.title: Processing Order
processing_info.description: Thank you for waiting. Orders are currently being processed by management, prepared, and sent for shipping. We won't take long and are working hard to ensure orders go out on time to avoid delays. Follow your order progress live from this page.

cancel_info.title: You can cancel the order in this stage only
cancel_info.description: If you wish to cancel the order, you can do so during the processing stage. You cannot cancel once it has been shipped. Cancellation requests are reviewed by our team and fees may apply.

cancel_confirmation.subtitle: We apologize for this bad experience
cancel_confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to cancel the order? You cannot undo after this step
cancel_confirmation.description: You can go back from canceling the order now if you are not sure about canceling.

cancel_success_view.subtitle: We apologize for this bad experience
cancel_success_view.title: Your order has been canceled successfully, you can enjoy another purchase.
cancel_success_view.description: You can follow up on your orders and their progress from your cart page.

canceled_view.title: We apologize for this bad experience
canceled_view.description: The order has been canceled, but don't worry, you can order again and enjoy a wonderful and unique experience within Hawas. We received the cancellation request, reviewed it, and it was accepted. We are working on developing our services to suit your needs and to avoid any problems or obstacles you may face. Thank you for your patience.

review_success.title: Thank you for rating the order!
review_success.main_message: You can continue to request different services; we are always waiting for you
review_success.sub_message: You can follow up on your orders and their progress from your cart page.

success_modal.thanks: Thank you for completing the payment
success_modal.success_msg: Product ordered successfully, you can enjoy another purchase.
success_modal.track_msg: You can follow and track your orders from your basket page.
